Articles.Content:
One of my greatest developments yet. This unique atmospheric vessel is capable of carrying helicopters or VTOL craft on its narrow but flat surface. Use it as either a hovercraft or as an oceanic landing strip.

[glow=red,2,300]WARNING:[/glow] You need these mods in order to download this:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=10662.0 ----- Damned Robotics

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4873.0 ----- Amphibious Equipment

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=10138.0 ----- Damned Aerospace (for helicopter and VTOL engines that won\'t damage the carrier\'s surface)

Hmm... I wonder if a fully stock version is possible?

Any chance of a video of you landing on it? I\'d imagine that any VTOL engines would destroy the surface.

Hmm... I wonder if a fully stock version is possible?

Any chance of a video of you landing on it? I\'d imagine that any VTOL engines would destroy the surface.

Probably not. those floaters are really good.

The Damned Aerospace mod propeller engines won\'t destroy the surface of the carrier.

I do have a stock version of this, but it\'s the Mk1 variant (no pontoons). It can only be used as a hovercraft.
I\'d imagine a stock version would be possible, since parts already float, and this could go with my VTOL Pelican, could work quite nicely actually.
I think the Pelican jets have damaging exhaust.
